backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister actor with data models for users, glossary, articles, research papers, learning content, market data, blogs, and includes authorization, storage mixins, and maintenance checks.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing logo and favicon replacement features with component lists and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for all major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and global styling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation outlining the step‑by‑step procedure for retrying deployments and capturing logs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts, setting the favicon, and mounting the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Overview of deployment helper scripts, highlighting the retry build‑and‑deploy script.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Shell script automating staged deployment with full logging and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, maintenance handling, theme provider, query client, and calculator/blog/learning routes.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty placeholder file for a bar chart component.
Pie chart component rendering investment vs returns breakdown using an SVG donut and summary labels.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Interactive chat widget handling user messages, intent detection, refusal logic, backend querying, and displaying assistant replies with optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty placeholder file for custom-domain FAQ content.
Empty placeholder file for a custom-domain setup guide.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing dynamic NIFTY 50 market ticker with market-hours detection and stock price display using scrolling UI.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: UI panel to export, import, validate, and restore glossary snapshots with merge/replace options and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with navigation, theme toggle, mobile menu, authentication handling, and route-aware menu highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Simple full-page maintenance notice with branding, icon, and message for downtime periods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, syncing with identity changes, and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, managing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, including maintenance checks, user profiles, glossary lookups, chat requests, and category-based article retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full set of light/dark theme tokens for a finance-oriented UI using custom OKLCH variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App with global styling.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy cards using styled UI components and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays article categories in tabs and lists fetched articles per category using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements an APY calculator page allowing users to estimate contributions based on age and desired pension with a UI for inputs and results.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post by ID with metadata, tags, and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all blogs with cards, handling loading and errors, and links to individual blog details.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a CAGR calculator with user inputs and displays calculated investment growth rate.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows categorized navigation cards for various financial calculators.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Offers a contact and feedback form with email info and submission via backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays legal disclaimers and warnings about financial content and investment risks.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: A React page that computes EMI, total interest, and total repayment based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure, and displays results with input controls.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: A React EPF calculator that computes employee/employer contributions, interest accumulation, and maturity balance using monthly compounding.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: A fixed‑deposit calculator supporting simple and compound interest to compute maturity amount and interest earned from user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: An admin panel that authenticates users, checks admin status, and provides searchable, sortable access to all feedback entries.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: A loan comparison tool calculating fixed‑interest vs reducing‑balance totals and interest differences from user‑entered loan parameters.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Implements a searchable glossary with grouping, admin backup/restore, error handling, and term reference navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Calculates gratuity based on last drawn salary and years of service, showing eligibility and formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a GST calculator with inputs for amount and GST rate, computing CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Calculates home loan EMI, total repayment, and interest using loan amount, interest rate, and tenure inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero section, feature cards, navigation buttons, and a promotional finance-learning image.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Computes HRA exemption using salary details, rent, and city type, displaying exempt and taxable portions.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Loads learning sections and displays them in an accordion with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a compound-interest lump sum calculator with inputs, results, and a breakdown chart.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates projected NPS corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest earned using compound interest from user-provided parameters.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Simulates PPF growth with yearly contributions and interest to show total investment, returns, and maturity value.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a recurring deposit calculator with monthly inputs, computes maturity, interest, and total deposited, and displays results with form controls.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Displays SEBI/RBI regulatory info, investor protection details, and fraud awareness using tabs and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and lists research papers with loading states and PDF download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: React page that calculates simple interest from principal, rate, and time inputs and displays results formatted as INR.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Compares simple and compound interest based on principal, rate, time, and compounding frequency, returning interest values and differences.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements a SIP calculator using standard future value formula and shows invested amount, returns, and total value.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana maturity value based on yearly deposits, girl’s age, and fixed interest rate.
Provides step-up SIP calculations using either fixed amount or percentage increases, computing invested amount, total value, and returns.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: Simulates systematic withdrawal planning by projecting monthly withdrawals, portfolio growth, and final balance.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: Calculates XIRR for irregular dated cash flows using a Newton-Raphson approximation, with UI to add, edit, and remove entries.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utility functions for detecting language, intent types, and generating safe responses for a finance education chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formatting utilities for INR currency, Indian-number formatting, and percentage display.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions to extract main content and ‘also read’ references and provides helpers for term normalization and lookup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including from hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, with fallback and error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's versioned state, summarizing features of a React+TypeScript app backed by a Motoko canister with authentication, RBAC, maintenance mode, content modules, and UI capabilities.
